column4: my ubuntu is broken, i just installed it, first some windows would close right after opening, like they were crashing, then after a reboot the login window won't show up, i tried using the low graphics mode to get in but still doesn't work!?
i think it maybe the graphic drivers (nvidia) but i can't figure out how to uninstall them since i cannot login

my ubuntu is broken, i just installed it, first some windows would close right after opening, like they were crashing, then after a reboot the login window won't show up, i tried using the low graphics mode to get in but still doesn't work!?
how do i fix not getting a login screen?
guys im googling the shit outa this problem but im not getting any usable results need help!
is it crashed after a clean install? which version did you choose? Are you able to open a terminal?
